collections.name: Customers Choice
collections.description: Dried apricots packed with flavor and natural sweetness. A perfect snack to support your health with antioxidants, vitamins, and dietary fiber.

collections.name: New Arivals
collections.description: Sweet and chewy black sultanas, rich in natural sugars and essential nutrients. Ideal for snacking, baking, or adding to salads for extra flavor.

collections.name: Hot Sales
collections.description: Premium dried blueberries packed with antioxidants. A perfect snack to boost your energy, promote brain health, and satisfy your sweet cravings.

topSales.name: Kashmiri Kesar
topSales.description: Premium Kashmiri saffron known for its rich color and distinct flavor. Ideal for enhancing the taste and aroma of your dishes, desserts, and beverages while providing health benefits like boosting immunity.

topSales.name: Mongra Saffron
topSales.description: High-quality Mongra saffron known for its purity and potent flavor. A must-have ingredient to elevate your cooking and beverages, providing numerous health benefits such as aiding digestion and improving mood.

topSales.name: Shilajit
topSales.description: Shilajit, rich in minerals and antioxidants, boosts energy, enhances stamina, supports memory and focus, and protects brain health. It also promotes healthy aging and strengthens immunity

newArrivals.name: Pistachio
newArrivals.description: Fresh, crunchy pistachio kernels, rich in healthy fats, protein, and fiber. A great addition to your diet for improving heart health.

newArrivals.name: Cashew
newArrivals.description: Delicious and crunchy Cashew Nuts rich in healthy fats, vitamins, and minerals that support heart health, boost immunity, and enhance brain function. A great addition to salads or trail mixes.

newArrivals.name: Saffron Cream
newArrivals.description: Luxurious cream infused with pure saffron, known for its nourishing and revitalizing properties. Enhances skin texture and promotes a radiant glow.

newArrivals.name: Saffron Facial Kit
newArrivals.description: Complete facial kit with saffron-based products to provide a glowing, radiant complexion. Perfect for a luxurious home spa experience.

hotSales.name: Cherry
hotSales.description: Dried Cherries packed with vitamins and antioxidants that improve skin health, reduce inflammation, and support immune function. Enjoy them as a snack or mix into your morning oats.

hotSales.name: Honey Roasted Muesli
hotSales.description: A delicious blend of honey-roasted muesli, nuts, and fruits, perfect for a healthy breakfast or a mid-day snack. Rich in fiber and protein, it boosts metabolism and supports digestion.

hotSales.name: Kehwa Masala
hotSales.description: Traditional Kashmiri Kehwa masala, a perfect blend of spices and saffron. Ideal for brewing a warm, soothing drink with rich flavors and health benefits like improved digestion.

hotSales.name: Walnut Chocolates
hotSales.description: Rich walnut chocolates with a perfect balance of crunch and sweetness, a delightful treat.
